name: whimsically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a whimsical way (= unusual and strange in a way that might be funny or annoying): He was whimsically charming and especially warm with children. It is a refreshingly quirky adult fairy tale set in a whimsically surreal world. See
whimsical
More examplesFewer examplesFurniture and books are displayed in a whimsically Gothic interior.The whimsically irregular wooden benches and tables are made by the talented staff.The whimsically decorated shack serves fried green tomatoes and alligator pizza every night.
